name: The Mysterious Island [ALPHA]
description:
In This Game, You FIGHT enemies and GATHER resources while being on an island with wood, stone, and other things.

⚠⚠ WARNING ⚠⚠

THIS GAME IS STILL IN EARLY ACSES, SO SOME OF THE FEATURES YOU've JUST READ ARE STILL IN WORKING!!!

Whats New?

In this version of the game (ALPHA) I've added a  lot of new stuff to this game like...

MINING CRAFTING (press e) GOLD (you can mine it when you craft pickaxe) PICKAXE

And So Much More!
